name: Fallen Down (stephen321, OneEyedBanshee, wqkjfi87, AyJayTee)
description:
Another victim of corporate overwork. You the player burnt out and after a long sleep woke up in your grave! Only for it to quickly open up and drop you down in to purgatory.

Strangely enough this purgatory is filled with other office workers doing the same jobs as before, seemingly the only hope is to do well at these mundane tasks in the hope of getting through into haven... Or lord forbid be damned to hell!!

Click the shiny buttons just as you did in your living life, work hard and maybe some divine creator will look kindly on you and save you from your purgatory.

Controls

W A S D to move

Space to jump

Escape to pause

Mouse click on buttons

Fallen Down made by; 

Stephen Ennis

Chris D.R Evans

Craig Johnston

Aidan Thomas
